sentences.cn: 你能重复一遍你的问题吗？

sentences.en: Sorry - could you repeat that?
sentences.cn: 对不起——你能再说一遍吗？

sentences.en: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
sentences.cn: 那不是我的错，我再说一遍，不是。

phrases.cn: [美国英语]以及返程，打个来回

sentences.en: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.
sentences.cn: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.en: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.cn: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.en: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.cn: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

sentences.en: Clean the surface with a damp cloth.
sentences.cn: 用一块湿布清洗表面。

sentences.en: Hundreds of tons of oil spilled into the ocean.
sentences.cn: 数百吨石油溢出流入大海。

sentences.en: The Russians have oil and gas —tons of it —and we need it.
sentences.cn: 俄罗斯人有很多石油和天然气，而我们需要这些东西。

sentences.en: If someone has tons of longevity marks, I start to worry about what insurance companies and others would do.
sentences.cn: 如果人有许多长寿标记的话，我开始担心保险公司和别人该做些什么了。

sentences.en: For a New Year’s resolution, we should all consider following suit. I found a great website at [LiveVegan.org] that has recipes and tons of other useful information.
sentences.cn: 作为一个新年决心，我们都应该考虑照着做，我发现一个极好的网站 —— 充满生命力的纯素食者 —— 这里有食谱和许多其它有用的资料。

sentences.en: a rubber ball
sentences.cn: 橡皮球

sentences.en: Recycling is important to help protect our environment.
sentences.cn: 回收利用对保护环境很重要。

sentences.en: The patient made a rapid recovery.
sentences.cn: 病人迅速康复。

sentences.en: a period of rapid decline
sentences.cn: 迅速衰退期

sentences.en: He fired three times in rapid succession (= one after another ) .
sentences.cn: 他接连开了三枪。

sentences.en: Roy was standing only a few steps away.
sentences.cn: 罗伊站在只有几步之遥的地方。

sentences.en: My grandson's birthday was on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 我孙子的生日是星期二。

sentences.en: ...a drawing of my granddaughter Amelia.
sentences.cn: …一幅我孙女阿梅莉亚的画像。
